Since our founding in 2021, we have prioritized ethical quality, product innovation and broad access through distributor partnerships and career engagement. 	The Inventory and liaison officer will be accountable for the company’s nationwide stock; making sure stock is accurate at all time and also be in constant communication with all agents working with the company.


Responsibilities and Duties


	Accounting for all incoming and outgoing stock
	Making sure products are well stocked with agents nationwide
	Ensuring timely communication with agents nationwide
	Monitoring every stock requested from and returned to the main office
	Creating due process to be followed in accessing the Inventory
	Ensuring prompt actions and services from agents nationwide.


Job Requirements


	Must have at least HND
	Must have at least 2 years of experience as an inventory manager or store keeper
	Must have good management skills
	Must have good accountability
	Must be able to handle challenging situations professionally.
	Must have the ability to multi-task, prioritize and manage time effectively
	Must have good interpersonal and leadership skills
	Must live within Okota/Ago/Isolo and environs.




Method of Application


Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV in PDF to: jobs@nirvanasynergy.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
